europeana:record.dc:title: Freshwater planarians from artesian springs in Queensland, Australia (Platyhelminthes, Tricladida, Paludicola)
Contributions to Zoology
europeana:record.dc:creator: Sluys R.
Grant L.J.
Blair D.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Platyhelminthes, Aschelminthes, Annelida
artesian springs
Australia
Dugesiidae
Platyhelminthes
Tricladida
Dugesia
Weissius
europeana:record.dc:description: Two new species of triclad flatworm are described from artesian springs in Queensland, Australia, viz. Dugesia artesiana Sluys and Grant, sp. nov. and Weissius capaciductus Sluys, gen. et sp. nov. Some historical biogeographic scenarios are discussed that may explain the occurrence of the new species and their close relatives in Australia.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Freshwater planarians from artesian springs in Queensland, Australia (Platyhelminthes, Tricladida, Paludicola) (URN:ISSN:13834517) (Volume 76, 1)
